checkmate.logic.game

Class CastlingAndCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkmate.logic.game.CastlingAndCheck

  • public class CastlingAndCheck
extends Object
    Class for checking castling and check.
    Author:
    llmlks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CastlingAndCheck(Player[] pl, ChessBoard cb, Validator val)
      Constructor sets final variables for players, chessboard and validator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeCaptured(Piece p)
      Goes through all the pieces on the board, and if the piece under inspection is of different colour than the one given as a parameter, checks whether it can move to parameter pieces square legally.
      ArrayList<Square> castlingSquares(ArrayList<Piece> rooks, Square kingS)
      Returns squares to which player can castle.
      ArrayList<Piece> findPlayersRooks(String colour)
      Returns a list of rooks of specified colour.
      boolean isChecked(Player player)
      Checks whether player's king is in check.
      ArrayList<Square> movesCausingCheck(ArrayList<Square> moves, Piece p)
      Checks the list given as parameter, if any of the moves would cause check.
      ArrayList<Square> possibleCastlingSquares(Piece king)
      Checks whether player has available rooks on the board and if player's king is in its initial position, then returns a list of squares the player can castle their king.
      boolean tryMove(Piece p, Square s)
      Checks whether moving a player's piece to a square would cause that player to become checked.

    • Method Detail

      • movesCausingCheck

        public final ArrayList<Square> movesCausingCheck(ArrayList<Square> moves,
                                                 Piece p)
        Checks the list given as parameter, if any of the moves would cause check.
        Parameters:
        moves - List of possible moves
        p - Piece to be moved
        Returns:
        List of moves that would cause for the player to become checked

      • tryMove

        public final boolean tryMove(Piece p,
                             Square s)
        Checks whether moving a player's piece to a square would cause that player to become checked.
        Parameters:
        p - Piece which will be temporarily moved
        s - Square to which the move is tried
        Returns:
        true if move doesn't cause check, false otherwise

      • canBeCaptured

        public final boolean canBeCaptured(Piece p)
        Goes through all the pieces on the board, and if the piece under inspection is of different colour than the one given as a parameter, checks whether it can move to parameter pieces square legally.
        Parameters:
        p - Piece
        Returns:
        true if piece can be captured, false otherwise

      • isChecked

        public final boolean isChecked(Player player)
        Checks whether player's king is in check.
        Parameters:
        player - Player whose check situation is to be looked at
        Returns:
        true if the player is in check, false otherwise

      • possibleCastlingSquares

        public final ArrayList<Square> possibleCastlingSquares(Piece king)
        Checks whether player has available rooks on the board and if player's king is in its initial position, then returns a list of squares the player can castle their king.
        Parameters:
        king - Players king
        Returns:
        List of squares where king can move to for castling

      • findPlayersRooks

        public final ArrayList<Piece> findPlayersRooks(String colour)
        Returns a list of rooks of specified colour.
        Parameters:
        colour - String for colour, w for white or b for black
        Returns:
        List of rooks of type Piece of the colour specified

      • castlingSquares

        public final ArrayList<Square> castlingSquares(ArrayList<Piece> rooks,
                                               Square kingS)
        Returns squares to which player can castle.
        Parameters:
        rooks - List of players rooks that are still available
        kingS - Square where player's king is positioned
        Returns:
        List of squares where king can move to for castling
